subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The United States Anti-Doping Agency said it had more than 10 witnesses — including some of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates and allies — who agreed to testify.
snippet: The United States Anti-Doping Agency said it had more than 10 witnesses — including some of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates and allies — who agreed to testify.
